page.title: 02View From Abroad
page.content: {VIEW FROM ABROAD} I have lived in England 5 years, pre- viously being brought up in the sub- tropics of Brisbane Australia; such a vast, spacious country compared to the quaintness & patchwork countryside with delightful little villages of England. At first it was the romantic sight I had imagined whilst still in Australia. With the coming of winter reality set in & a great change in my life. Living indoors & trying to keep warm were not things that I had taken into account. Even sports are played indoors!{(Maybe the Australians will {try this, after loosing to us at {Cricket in 1985 OUTDOORS - Ed.)} Village life is lovely, I enjoy the many joint functions, fetes etc. I'm sorry to see more people commuting to work, exploiting ideal village ways & not always lending full support.
